# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/mincr.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/mincr.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir COMMAND $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> mincr.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel")
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP mincr.cir)
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} mincr.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.prn mincr.cir.prn )
  set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED mincr.cir)
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir COMMAND mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 $<TARGET_FILE:Xyce> mincr.cir )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel")
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP mincr.cir)
add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} mincr.cir ${OutputDataDir}/MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.prn mincr.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(${TestNamePrefix}MINCAPRES/mincr.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED mincr.cir)
endif()
